name: Alpha Thread
description:
A game about beginnings and endings, life, eternity, repetition, curiosity, exploration, mystery, confusion, frustration, sadness, suffering, resilience, endurance, denial, acceptance, learning, trust, faith, hope, pride, humility, simplicity, complexity, sub-text, the meta-verse, reality... you... me... sewing?

Let me know if you make it to the end!

Thanks for playing!
